title: AblaNTIS-test-cases: Database for the ablative test cases of the AblaNTIS project
description: Dataset developed under ESA GSTP contract no. 4000122914/18/NL/KML, containing experimental and numerical test cases for ablative TPS validation. Includes results from VKI plasma wind tunnel testing and simulations using three state-of-the-art tools. Supports the accompanying publication on ablation benchmarking.
notes: This dataset was developed as part of the ESA GSTP AblaNTIS project. Commercial use is restricted under CC BY-NC 4.0. For permissions, please contact the authors. Acknowledgements include DLR, FZ JÃ¼lich, UGhent, Dr. Jean Lachaud, and VKI technical staff.
